#: The metadata concept contains metadata about the feature. Who created it, where it came from, etc. This doesn't contain actual information about the feature.

tag.name: source:geometry
tag.description: Use the source:geometry=* tag to indicate the source of the geometry of an object added to OpenStreetMap.

tag.name: source:geometry:sensor
tag.description: The sensor used to collect the source imagery.

tag.name: source:geometry:date
tag.description: The date the source material was collected. Preferrably as ISO 8601.
